## Description {#details}

This class is basically a combination of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timeregion">TimeRegion</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>.

It allows you to declare a new timer, AND specify the region to time, all in one statement. All timers with the same name are merged. This is primarily used for debugging and for hunting performance problems.

Definition at line 168 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/timer-h">Timer.h</a>.
